text: He is here and she is here.
translate: Dia (laki-laki) di sini dan dia (perempuan) di sini.

text: I was at the cinema yesterday.
We only work for five days.
In which hotel are you staying?
How long have you been here for?
translate: Sudah berapa lama Anda berada di sini?

text: How long will you be staying?
Shall we see each other tomorrow?
I am sorry, but I already have plans.
translate: Sayang sekali, saya sudah ada janji.

text: Do you drink tea with lemon?
translate: Apakah kamu minum teh dengan jeruk sitrun?

text: Do you drink coffee with sugar?
translate: Apakah kamu minum kopi dengan gula?
Satu menit terdiri dari enam puluh detik.
Satu jam terdiri dari enam puluh menit.
Satu hari terdiri dari dua puluh empat jam.

text: Do you drink water with ice?
translate: Apakah kamu minum air dengan es batu?

text: People are drinking wine and beer.
Do you drink Coke with rum?
translate: Apakah kamu minum coca cola dengan rum?

text: The child likes cocoa and apple juice.
translate: Anak itu menyukai susu cokelat dan sari buah apel.

text: The woman likes orange and grapefruit juice.
translate: Wanita itu menyukai sari buah jeruk dan sari limau gedang.

text: Where do they like to go?
They like to listen to music.
Where do they not like to go?
translate: Mereka tidak suka pergi ke mana?

text: They do not like to dance.
I have a kiwi and a melon.
translate: Saya mempunyai sebuah kiwi dan sebuah melon.

text: I have an orange and a grapefruit.
translate: Saya mempunyai sebuah jeruk dan limau gedang.

text: I have an apple and a mango.
translate: Saya mempunyai sebuah apel dan mangga.

text: I have a banana and a pineapple.
translate: Saya mempunyai sebuah pisang dan nanas.

text: I am making a fruit salad.
I am eating toast with butter.
translate: Saya makan roti panggang dengan mentega.

text: I am eating toast with butter and jam.
translate: Saya makan roti panggang dengan mentega dan selai.

text: I am eating a sandwich with margarine.
translate: Saya makan roti lapis dengan margarin.

text: I am eating a sandwich with margarine and tomatoes.
translate: Saya makan roti lapis margarin dan tomat.

text: We need carrots and tomatoes for the soup.
translate: Kita membutuhkan wortel dan tomat untuk sup.

text: We like to go for a walk in summer.
translate: Kami suka berjalan kaki pada musim panas.

text: It snows or rains in winter.
translate: Salju atau hujan turun pada musim dingin.

text: We like to stay home in winter.
translate: Kami suka berada di rumah pada musim dingin.

text: What is the weather like today?
Do you have a new kitchen?
What do you want to cook today?
translate: Apa yang ingin kamu masak hari ini?

text: Do you cook on an electric or a gas stove?
translate: Apa kamu memasak dengan listrik atau dengan gas?

text: Do you have a tin opener / can opener (am.)?
Do you have a bottle opener?

translate: Apa kamu punya pembuka tutup gabus?

text: Are you cooking the soup in this pot?
translate: Apa kamu memasak sup dengan panci ini?

text: Are you frying the fish in this pan?
translate: Apa kamu menggoreng ikan dengan wajan ini?

text: Are you grilling the vegetables on this grill?
translate: Apa kamu memanggang sayuran di pemanggang ini?

text: Here are the knives, the forks and the spoons.
Here are the glasses, the plates and the napkins.

translate: Bolehkah saya memperkenalkan Anda dengan Bapak Müller?

text: Are you here for the first time?
translate: Apakah ini pertama kalinya Anda kemari?

text: No, I was here once last year.
translate: Tidak, saya pernah kemari tahun kemarin.

text: How do you like it here?
A lot. The people are nice.
And I like the scenery, too.
No, my wife / my husband is also here.
translate: Tidak, istri / suami saya juga ada di sini.

text: And those are my two children.
translate: Di sana itu kedua anak kami.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the snow? White.
What colour / color (am.) is the sun? Yellow.
What colour / color (am.) is the orange? Orange.
What colour / color (am.) is the cherry? Red.
What colour / color (am.) is the sky? Blue.
What colour / color (am.) is the grass? Green.
What colour / color (am.) is the earth? Brown.
What colour / color (am.) is the cloud? Grey / Gray (am.).
What colour / color (am.) are the tyres / tires (am.)? Black.

translate: Di bawah itu ruang bawah tanah.

text: There is a garden behind the house.
translate: Di belakang rumah ada sebuah taman.

text: There is no street in front of the house.
translate: Di depan rumah tidak ada jalan.

text: There are trees next to the house.
The kitchen and bathroom are here.
The living room and bedroom are there.
translate: Di sana ada ruang tamu dan kamar tidur.

text: We are going to the living room.
There is a sofa and an armchair there.
translate: Di sana ada sofa dan kursi tamu.
Di sana ada perangkat stereo saya.

text: The TV set is brand new.

translate: Tapi sekarang saya tidak merokok lagi.

text: Does it disturb you if I smoke?
translate: Apakah mengganggu Anda bila saya merokok?
Ya, kebanyakan pergi untuk urusan kerja.
Tapi sekarang kami sedang berlibur di sini.

text: I waited for you for half an hour.
translate: Saya sudah setengah jam menunggu kamu.

text: Don’t you have a mobile / cell phone (am.) with you?
Take an umbrella with you next time!
I have the day off tomorrow.
I’m sorry, I can’t make it tomorrow.
Do you already have plans for this weekend?
translate: Apakah akhir pekan ini kamu ada rencana?

text: Or do you already have an appointment?
I suggest that we meet on the weekend.
translate: Saya usulkan, kita bertemu saat akhir pekan.

text: Shall we go to the beach?
translate: Apakah kita akan pergi ke pantai?

text: Shall we go to the mountains?
translate: Apakah kita akan pergi ke gunung?

text: I will pick you up at the office.
I will pick you up at home.
I will pick you up at the bus stop.
translate: Saya jemput kamu di halte bus.

text: What would you like to drink?
Do you play a musical instrument?
I am currently reading this book.
What do you like to read?
Do you like to go to concerts?
Do you like to go to the theatre / theater (am.)?
Do you like to go to the opera?
Peter and Martha are from Berlin.
translate: Peter dan Martha berasal dari Berlin.

text: Do both of you speak German?
translate: Apakah kalian berdua berbicara bahasa Jerman?

text: Madrid and Berlin are also capital cities.
translate: Madrid dan Berlin juga merupakan ibu kota.

text: Capital cities are big and noisy.
translate: Ibu kota itu besar dan ramai.

text: Do you have a vacant room?

translate: Saya sudah melakukan reservasi untuk satu kamar.
Saya butuh kamar untuk satu orang.
Saya butuh kamar untuk dua orang.

text: What does the room cost per night?
I would like a room with a bathroom.
translate: Saya ingin kamar dengan kamar mandi.

text: I would like a room with a shower.
translate: Saya ingin kamar dengan pancuran air.
Apakah ada kotak deposit di sini?

text: Is there a fax machine here?
translate: Apakah ada mesin faks di sini?

text: What time do you serve breakfast?
What time do you serve lunch?
translate: Jam berapa waktu untuk makan siang?

text: What time do you serve dinner?
translate: Jam berapa waktu untuk makan malam?

text: There is no telephone in the room.
There is no TV in the room.
Is there a youth hostel nearby?
translate: Apakah di sekitar sini ada hostel?

text: Is there a boarding house / a bed and breakfast nearby?
translate: Apakah di sekitar sini ada rumah penginapan?
Apakah di sekitar sini ada restoran?
Di mana Anda belajar bahasa Spanyol?

text: Yes, and I also speak some Italian.
translate: Ya, dan saya juga dapat berbahasa Italia sedikit.

text: I think you speak very well.
translate: Menurut saya, Anda berbicara dengan sangat baik.
Bahasa agak mirip satu sama lainnya.
Saya dapat mengerti itu dengan baik.

text: But speaking and writing is difficult.
translate: Tapi berbicara dan menulis itu hal yang sulit.

text: You only have a slight accent.
One can tell where you come from.
translate: Orang mengetahui, dari mana Anda berasal.

text: What is your mother tongue / native language (am.)?
Are you taking a language course?

translate: Buku teks mana yang Anda gunakan?

text: I don’t remember the name right now.
translate: Saat ini saya tidak tahu apa namanya.

text: The title is not coming to me.
I’d like a glass of red wine.
I’d like a glass of white wine.
I’d like a bottle of champagne.
I’d like something that won’t take much time.
translate: Saya ingin sesuatu yang dimasak tidak terlalu lama.

text: Would you like that with rice?
translate: Anda ingin makan itu dengan nasi?

text: Would you like that with pasta?
translate: Anda ingin makan itu dengan mie?

text: Would you like that with potatoes?
translate: Anda ingin makan itu dengan kentang?

text: I would like an ice cream with whipped cream.
I would like some fruit or cheese.
We would like to have breakfast.
We would like to have lunch.
We would like to have dinner.
What would you like for breakfast?
translate: Apa yang Anda inginkan untuk sarapan?
Roti panggang dengan sosis dan keju?

text: Some salt and pepper also, please.

translate: Kami punya waktu pada hari ini.

text: We are cleaning the apartment today.
My husband is washing the car.
The children are cleaning the bicycles.
The children are cleaning up the children’s room.
My husband is tidying up his desk.
I am putting the laundry in the washing machine.
translate: Saya memasukkan cucian ke dalam mesin cuci.

text: I am hanging up the laundry.
translate: Saya menggantung baju yang baru dicuci.

text: Do you see the tower there?
translate: Apakah kamu melihat menara di sana?

text: Do you see the mountain there?
translate: Apakah kamu melihat gunung di sana?

text: Do you see the village there?
translate: Apakah kamu melihat desa di sana?

text: Do you see the river there?
translate: Apakah kamu melihat sungai di sana?

text: Do you see the bridge there?
translate: Apakah kamu melihat jembatan di sana?
Siapa yang mencuci piring dan gelas?

text: Do you see the lake there?
translate: Apakah kamu melihat danau di sana?

text: Is that the train to Berlin?
When does the train arrive in Berlin?
I think this is my seat.
I think you’re sitting in my seat.
translate: Saya pikir, Anda duduk di tempat saya.

text: The sleeper is at the end of the train.
translate: Gerbong tempat tidur ada di bagian belakang kereta.

text: And where is the dining car? – At the front.
translate: Dan di mana gerbong ruang makan? – Di depan.
Apakah saya dapat tidur di bawah?

text: Can I sleep in the middle?
translate: Apakah saya dapat tidur di tengah?

text: Can I sleep at the top?
translate: Apakah saya dapat tidur di atas?

text: When will we get to the border?
How long does the journey to Berlin take?
Do you have something to read?
translate: Apakah Anda punya sesuatu untuk dibaca?

text: Can one get something to eat and to drink here?
translate: Apakah orang bisa mendapat makanan dan minuman di sini?

text: Could you please wake me up at 7 o’clock?
translate: Apakah Anda bisa membangunkan saya pukul 7 pagi?

text: I’d like chips / French fries (am.) with ketchup.
translate: Seporsi kentang goreng dengan saus tomat.
Dan tiga sosis panggang dengan mustar.

text: Do you also like to eat leek?
translate: Apakah Anda juga suka makan bawang prei?

text: Do you also like to eat sauerkraut?
translate: Apakah Anda juga suka makan asinan kubis?

text: Do you also like to eat lentils?
translate: Apakah Anda juga suka makan kacang lentil?

text: Do you also like to eat carrots?
translate: Apakah kamu juga suka makan wortel?

text: Do you also like to eat broccoli?
translate: Apakah kamu juga suka makan brokoli?

text: Do you also like to eat peppers?
translate: Apakah kamu juga suka makan paprika?

text: I would like to go to the station.
I would like to go to the airport.
I would like to go to the city centre / center (am.).
How do I get to the station?
translate: Bagaimana cara saya ke stasiun kereta?

text: How do I get to the airport?
How do I get to the city centre / center (am.)?
translate: Bagaimana cara saya ke pusat kota?

text: I would like to rent a car.
What is there to see in the city?
translate: Apa saja yang dapat dilihat di kota?

text: Go on a harbour / harbor (am.) tour.
Are there any other places of interest?
translate: Obyek wisata apa lagi yang ada selain itu?

text: I would like the menu, please.
I’d like a coffee with milk.
I’d like a tea with lemon.
translate: Saya ingin teh dengan jeruk sitrun.

text: I’d like a tea with milk.
Which bus goes to the city centre / center (am.)?
translate: Bus mana yang pergi ke pusat kota?

text: Which bus do I have to take?
translate: Jalur bus mana yang harus saya ambil?

text: Where do I have to change?
translate: Di mana saya harus ganti bus?

text: How much does a ticket cost?
How many stops are there before downtown / the city centre?
translate: Berapa halte bus yang dilewati sampai ke pusat kota?

text: You have to get off here.
You have to get off at the back.
The next train is in 5 minutes.
translate: Kereta bawah tanah berikutnya tiba 5 menit lagi.

text: The next tram is in 10 minutes.
The next bus is in 15 minutes.

translate: Kapan kereta bawah tanah terakhir berangkat?

text: A ticket? – No, I don’t have one.
Then you have to pay a fine.
translate: Kalau begitu Anda harus membayar denda.

text: We are having class / a lesson.

translate: Belajar bahasa adalah hal yang menarik.

text: We want to speak with people.
Is it dangerous to hitchhike alone?
translate: Apakah berbahaya menumpang sendirian di sini?

text: Is it dangerous to go for a walk at night?
translate: Apakah berbahaya berjalan-jalan di malam hari?
Di mana orang bisa parkir di sini?

text: Is there a parking lot here?
translate: Apakah di sini ada tempat parkir mobil?

text: How long can one park here?
translate: Berapa lama bisa parkir di sini?

text: Do you take the ski lift to the top?
translate: Apakah Anda naik lift ski ke atas?
Apakah di sini orang dapat menyewa peralatan ski?

text: Is there a good restaurant around here?
Take a left at the corner.
translate: Di pojok, Anda belok ke kiri.

text: Then go straight for a while.
translate: Anda jalan lagi lurus ke sana.

text: Then go right for a hundred metres / meters (am.).
translate: Anda jalan lagi seratus meter lalu ke kanan.

text: You can also take the bus.
You can also take the tram.
You can also follow me with your car.
translate: Anda juga dapat mengikuti saya dari belakang.

text: How do I get to the football / soccer (am.) stadium?
translate: Bagaimana cara saya ke stadion sepak bola?

text: Drive until you reach the third traffic light.
Then turn into the first street on your right.
translate: Di percabangan jalan, Anda belok ke kanan.

text: Then drive straight through the next intersection.
translate: Di persimpangan selanjutnya, Anda jalan lurus saja.

text: Excuse me, how do I get to the airport?
translate: Permisi, bagaimana cara saya ke bandara?

text: It is best if you take the underground / subway (am.).
translate: Cara terbaik yaitu dengan naik kereta bawah tanah.

text: Simply get out at the last stop.
When is the next train to Berlin?
translate: Kapan kereta selanjutnya berangkat ke Berlin?

text: When is the next train to Paris?
translate: Kapan kereta selanjutnya berangkat ke Paris?

text: When is the next train to London?
translate: Kapan kereta selanjutnya berangkat ke London?

text: When does the train for Warsaw leave?
translate: Jam berapa kereta berangkat ke Warsawa?

text: When does the train for Stockholm leave?
translate: Jam berapa kereta berangkat ke Stockholm?

text: When does the train for Budapest leave?
translate: Jam berapa kereta berangkat ke Budapest?

text: I’d like a ticket to Madrid.
translate: Saya ingin tiket kereta ke Madrid.

text: I’d like a ticket to Prague.
translate: Saya ingin tiket kereta ke Praha.

text: I’d like a ticket to Bern.
translate: Saya ingin tiket kereta ke Bern.

text: When does the train arrive in Vienna?
When does the train arrive in Moscow?
When does the train arrive in Amsterdam?
Do I have to change trains?
From which platform does the train leave?
translate: Dari jalur berapa kereta akan berangkat?
Apakah ada gerbong tidur di kereta?

text: I’d like a one-way ticket to Brussels.
translate: Saya hanya ingin tiket sekali jalan ke Brussel.

text: I’d like a return ticket to Copenhagen.
translate: Saya ingin tiket pulang pergi ke Kopenhagen.

text: What does a berth in the sleeper cost?
translate: Berapa harga tiket kereta dengan tempat tidur?

text: What does it cost to go to the station?
translate: Berapa biayanya untuk sampai ke stasiun?

text: What does it cost to go to the airport?
translate: Berapa biayanya untuk sampai ke bandara?

text: Please turn left at the corner.
translate: Tolong di pojok sana ke kiri.

text: That is okay, please keep the change.
Where is the next gas station?
translate: Di mana letak pom bensin berikutnya?

text: I have a flat tyre / tire (am.).
Can you change the tyre / tire (am.)?
I need a few litres / liters (am.) of diesel.
translate: Saya butuh beberapa liter minyak diesel.

text: I have no more petrol / gas (am.).
Do you have a petrol can / jerry can / gas can (am.)?
Where can I make a call?
Do you have a mobile / cell phone (am.) with you?
I’d like to book a flight to Athens.
translate: Saya ingin memesan penerbangan ke Athena.
Tolong tempatnya di dekat jendela, tidak merokok.

text: I would like to confirm my reservation.
I would like to cancel my reservation.
I would like to change my reservation.
translate: Saya ingin memesan kembali reservasi saya.

text: When is the next flight to Rome?
translate: Kapan pesawat berikutnya terbang ke Roma?
Apa ada dua kursi yang masih kosong?

text: No, we have only one seat available.
translate: Tidak, hanya ada satu kursi yang masih kosong.

text: When does a bus go to the city centre / center (am.)?
translate: Kapan ada bus yang pergi ke pusat kota?

text: How much luggage can I take?
translate: Berapa bagasi yang dapat saya bawa?

text: Where is the tourist information office?
translate: Di mana letak kantor informasi wisatawan?

text: Do you have a city map for me?
translate: Apakah Anda punya peta untuk saya?

text: Can one reserve a room here?
translate: Apakah di sini bisa memesan kamar hotel?

text: I would like a guide who speaks German.
translate: Saya ingin pemandu wisata yang berbahasa Jerman.

text: I would like a guide who speaks Italian.
translate: Saya ingin pemandu wisata yang berbahasa Italia.

text: I would like a guide who speaks French.
translate: Saya ingin pemandu wisata yang berbahasa Perancis.

text: I also have a video camera.
translate: Saya juga punya sebuah kamera film.

text: Where can I find a battery?
There is a café over there.
There is a restaurant over there.
Where are the gorillas and the zebras?
translate: Di mana ada gorila dan kuda zebra?

text: Where are the tigers and the crocodiles?
translate: Di mana ada harimau dan buaya?
Apakah ada klub malam di sini?

text: What’s playing at the theatre / theater (am.) this evening?
translate: Ada pertunjukan apa di teater malam ini?

text: What’s playing at the cinema / movies (am.) this evening?
translate: Ada film apa di bioskop malam ini?
Ada acara apa di televisi malam ini?

text: Are tickets for the theatre / theater (am.) still available?
translate: Apa masih ada tiket untuk teater?

text: Are tickets for the cinema / movies (am.) still available?
translate: Apa masih ada tiket untuk bioskop?

text: Are tickets for the football / soccer am. game still available?
translate: Apa masih ada tiket untuk pertandingan bola?

text: I want to sit in the back.
I want to sit somewhere in the middle.
I want to sit at the front.

translate: Apakah Anda dapat memberi saran kepada saya?

text: Can you get me a ticket?
translate: Dapatkah Anda mendapatkan tiket untuk saya?

text: Is there a golf course nearby?
translate: Apakah di dekat sini ada lapangan golf?

text: Is there a tennis court nearby?
translate: Apakah di dekat sini ada lapangan tenis?

text: Is there an indoor swimming pool nearby?
translate: Apakah di dekat sini ada kolam renang di dalam ruangan?

text: Isn’t it dangerous to swim there?
translate: Apakah tidak berbahaya berenang di sana?

text: Can one rent a sun umbrella / parasol here?
translate: Apakah di sini bisa meminjam payung?

text: Can one rent a deck chair here?
translate: Apakah di sini bisa meminjam kursi malas?

text: Can one rent a boat here?
translate: Apakah di sini bisa meminjam perahu?

text: I would like to water ski.

translate: Apakah bisa menyewa peralatan ski air?

text: I want to go to the library.
I want to go to the bookstore.
I want to go to the newspaper stand.
I want to borrow a book.
I want to buy a book.
I want to buy a newspaper.
I want to go to the library to borrow a book.
translate: Saya ingin ke perpustakaan untuk meminjam buku.

text: I want to go to the bookstore to buy a book.
translate: Saya ingin ke toko buku untuk membeli buku.

text: I want to go to the kiosk / newspaper stand to buy a newspaper.
translate: Saya ingin ke kios untuk membeli koran.

text: I want to go to the optician.
I want to go to the supermarket.
I want to go to the bakery.
I want to buy some glasses.
I want to buy fruit and vegetables.
translate: Saya ingin membeli buah dan sayuran.

text: I want to buy rolls and bread.
translate: Saya ingin membeli roti bulat dan bungkal roti.

text: I want to go to the optician to buy glasses.
translate: Saya ingin ke toko kacamata untuk membeli kacamata.

text: I want to go to the supermarket to buy fruit and vegetables.
translate: Saya ingin ke supermarket untuk membeli buah dan sayuran.

text: I want to go to the baker to buy rolls and bread.
translate: Saya ingin ke toko roti untuk membeli roti bulat dan bungkal roti.

text: You have to pack our suitcase!
Don’t forget your traveller’s cheques / traveler’s checks (am.)!
Take some suntan lotion with you.
Take the sun hat with you.
Do you want to take a road map?
Do you want to take a travel guide?
translate: Apakah kamu mau membawa buku petunjuk perjalanan?

text: Do you want to take an umbrella?
Remember to take pants, shirts and socks.
translate: Jangan lupa celana panjang, kemeja, kaus kaki.

text: Remember to take ties, belts and sports jackets.
Remember to take pyjamas, nightgowns and t-shirts.
translate: Jangan lupa piyama, kemeja tidur dan kaos.

text: You need shoes, sandals and boots.
translate: Kamu membutuhkan sepatu, sandal dan sepatu bot.

text: You need handkerchiefs, soap and a nail clipper.
translate: Kamu membutuhkan tisu, sabun dan gunting kuku.

text: You need a comb, a toothbrush and toothpaste.
translate: Kamu membutuhkan sisir, sikat gigi dan pasta gigi.

text: Is the market open on Sundays?
translate: Apakah pasar buka pada hari Minggu?

text: Is the fair open on Mondays?
translate: Apakah pameran buka pada hari Senin?

text: Is the exhibition open on Tuesdays?
translate: Apakah pameran buka pada hari Selasa?

text: Is the zoo open on Wednesdays?
translate: Apakah kebun binatang buka pada hari Rabu?

text: Is the museum open on Thursdays?
translate: Apakah museum buka pada hari Kamis?

text: Is the gallery open on Fridays?
translate: Apakah galeri buka pada hari Jumat?

text: Does one have to pay an entrance fee?
How much is the entrance fee?
Is there a discount for groups?
translate: Apakah ada potongan harga untuk grup?

text: Is there a discount for children?
translate: Apakah ada potongan harga untuk anak-anak?

text: Is there a discount for students?
translate: Apakah ada potongan harga untuk pelajar?

text: We want to go to the cinema.
A good film is playing today.
translate: Hari ini sedang diputar film yang bagus.

text: How much are the admission tickets?
I want to sit at the back.
I want to sit at the front.
I want to sit in the middle.
But the book on which the film was based was better.
translate: Tapi bukunya lebih bagus dibanding filmnya.
Apakah ada terjemahan dalam bahasa Inggris?

text: Shall we go to the swimming pool?
translate: Apakah kita pergi ke kolam renang?

text: Do you have a bathing suit?

translate: Dia mabuk. Namun dia tetap naik sepeda.

text: Although she went to college, she can’t find a job.
translate: Dia tidak menemukan pekerjaan, meskipun dia telah tamat kuliah.

text: Although she is in pain, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: Dia tidak pergi ke dokter, meskipun dia merasa sakit.

text: Although she has no money, she buys a car.
translate: Dia membeli mobil, meskipun dia tidak memiliki uang.

text: She went to college. Nevertheless, she can’t find a job.
translate: Dia telah tamat kuliah. Walaupun demikian dia tidak menemukan pekerjaan.

text: She is in pain. Nevertheless, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: Dia merasa sakit. Walaupun demikian dia tidak pergi ke dokter.

text: She has no money. Nevertheless, she buys a car.
translate: Dia tidak memiliki uang. Walaupun demikian dia membeli mobil.

text: I’m angry that you drink so much beer.
translate: Saya jengkel kamu minum begitu banyak bir.

text: I’m angry that you come so late.
translate: Saya jengkel kamu datang begitu terlambat.

text: I think he needs a doctor.
I think he is sleeping now.
translate: Saya rasa sekarang dia sedang tidur.

text: We hope that he marries our daughter.
translate: Kami berharap bahwa dia menikahi anak perempuan kami.

text: We hope that he has a lot of money.
translate: Kami berharap bahwa dia memiliki banyak uang.

text: We hope that he is a millionaire.
translate: Kami berharap bahwa dia itu miliuner.

text: I heard that your wife had an accident.
translate: Saya telah mendengar bahwa istrimu mengalami kecelakaan.

text: I heard that she is in the hospital.
translate: Saya telah mendengar bahwa dia berada di rumah sakit.

text: I heard that your car is completely wrecked.
translate: Saya telah mendengar bahwa mobilmu benar-benar rusak.

text: I’m happy that you are interested.
I’m happy that you want to buy the house.
translate: Saya senang bahwa Anda mau membeli rumah.

text: I’m afraid the last bus has already gone.
translate: Saya khawatir jika bus yang terakhir sudah pergi.

text: I’m afraid we will have to take a taxi.
translate: Saya khawatir jika kita harus naik taksi.

text: I’m afraid I have no more money.
translate: Saya khawatir jika saya tidak membawa uang.

text: My son did not want to play with the doll.
translate: Anak lelaki saya tidak ingin bermain dengan boneka.

text: My daughter did not want to play football / soccer (am.).
translate: Anak perempuan saya tidak ingin bermain sepak bola.

text: My wife did not want to play chess with me.
translate: Istri saya tidak ingin bermain catur dengan saya.

text: My children did not want to go for a walk.
translate: Anak-anak saya tidak ingin berjalan kaki.

text: They did not want to tidy the room.
They did not want to go to bed.
He was not allowed to eat ice cream.
translate: Dia tidak boleh makan es krim.

text: He was not allowed to eat chocolate.
He was not allowed to eat sweets.
I was allowed to make a wish.
translate: Saya boleh mengharapkan sesuatu untuk diri saya.

text: I was allowed to buy myself a dress.
I was allowed to take a chocolate.
Were you allowed to smoke in the airplane?
Were you allowed to drink beer in the hospital?
translate: Bolehkah kamu minum bir di rumah sakit?

text: Were you allowed to take the dog into the hotel?
translate: Bolehkah kamu membawa anjing ke hotel?

text: During the holidays the children were allowed to remain outside late.
translate: Saat liburan anak-anak boleh bermain lama di luar.

text: They were allowed to play in the yard for a long time.
translate: Mereka boleh lama bermain di halaman.

text: They were allowed to stay up late.
translate: Mereka boleh terjaga sampai larut malam.

text: Since when is she no longer working?
translate: Sejak kapan dia tidak bekerja lagi?

text: Yes, she is no longer working since she got married.
translate: Ya, dia tidak bekerja lagi sejak dia menikah.

text: Since she got married, she’s no longer working.
translate: Sejak dia menikah, dia tidak bekerja lagi.

text: Since they have met each other, they are happy.
translate: Sejak mereka saling mengenal, mereka bahagia.

text: Since they have had children, they rarely go out.
translate: Sejak mereka memiliki anak, mereka jarang bepergian.
Dia menelepon selama dia mengendarai mobil.

text: She watches TV while she irons.
translate: Dia menonton televisi selama dia menyetrika.

text: She listens to music while she does her work.
translate: Dia mendengarkan musik selama dia melakukan tugas-tugasnya.

text: I can’t see anything when I don’t have glasses.
translate: Saya tidak melihat apa pun kalau saya tidak mengenakan kacamata.

text: I can’t understand anything when the music is so loud.
translate: Saya tidak mengerti apa pun kalau musiknya sangat keras.

text: I can’t smell anything when I have a cold.
translate: Saya tidak mencium apa pun kalau saya menderita flu.

text: We’ll take a taxi if it rains.
We’ll travel around the world if we win the lottery.
translate: Kami berkeliling dunia kalau kami memenangkan lotre.

text: We’ll start eating if he doesn’t come soon.
translate: Kami mulai makan kalau dia tidak segera datang.

text: Have you already been to Berlin?
No, I don’t know anyone here.
translate: Tidak, saya tidak mengenal seorang pun.

text: a little longer – not much longer
Will you stay here a little longer?
translate: Apakah Anda masih lama di sini?

text: No, I won’t stay here much longer.
translate: Tidak, saya tidak lama tinggal di sini.

text: Would you like to drink something else?
translate: Apakah Anda masih mau minum sesuatu?

text: No, I don’t want anything else.
translate: Tidak, saya tidak mau minum lagi.

text: No, I haven’t eaten anything yet.

translate: masih ada (orang) – tidak ada seorang pun

text: Does anyone else want a coffee?
translate: Apakah masih ada (orang) yang ingin kopi?
Tidak, tidak ada seorang pun yang ingin minum lagi.

text: The button from the shirt is gone.
The boss’ computer is not working.

translate: Siapa orang tua dari anak perempuan ini?

text: How do I get to her parents’ house?
translate: Bagaimana saya datang ke rumah orang tua Anda?

text: The house is at the end of the road.
What is the name of the capital city of Switzerland?
What is the title of the book?
What are the names of the neighbour’s / neighbor’s (am.) children?
What are the doctor’s consultation times?
What time is the museum open?
Perhaps the weather will get better tomorrow.
translate: Cuaca esok hari mungkin akan membaik.
Dari mana Anda mengetahui hal itu?

text: I hope that it gets better.
translate: Saya harap, bahwa cuaca menjadi lebih baik.

text: Do you know that for sure?
I think that it is old.

translate: Menurut saya, bahwa dia bahkan benar-benar tampan.

text: The boss definitely has a girlfriend.
translate: Bos itu pasti memiliki seorang kekasih.

text: It is very possible that he has a girlfriend.
translate: Bisa jadi, bahwa dia mempunyai seorang kekasih.

text: I get up as soon as the alarm rings.
translate: Saya bangun ketika jam wekernya berbunyi.

text: I become tired as soon as I have to study.
translate: Saya lelah ketika saya harus belajar.

text: I will stop working as soon as I am 60.
translate: Saya berhenti bekerja kalau saya berumur 60 tahun.

text: The journey was beautiful, but too tiring.
translate: Perjalanannya memang menyenangkan, tetapi terlalu melelahkan.

text: The train was on time, but too full.
translate: Keretanya memang tepat waktu, tetapi terlalu penuh.

text: The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.
translate: Hotelnya memang nyaman, tetapi terlalu mahal.

text: He’ll take either the bus or the train.
He’ll come either this evening or tomorrow morning.
translate: Dia datang malam ini atau besok pagi.

text: As soon as I have a moment.
He’ll call, as soon as he has a little time.
translate: Dia menelepon segera ketika dia punya sedikit waktu.

text: I’ll work as long as I can.
translate: Saya akan bekerja selama saya bisa.

text: I’ll work as long as I am healthy.
translate: Saya akan bekerja selama saya sehat.

text: He lies in bed instead of working.
translate: Dia lebih memilih berbaring di tempat tidur daripada bekerja.

text: She reads the newspaper instead of cooking.
translate: Dia lebih memilih membaca koran daripada memasak.

text: He is at the bar instead of going home.
translate: Dia lebih memilih duduk di bar daripada pulang ke rumah.

text: As far as I know, he lives here.
translate: Sejauh yang saya tahu, dia tinggal di sini.

text: As far as I know, his wife is ill.
translate: Sejauh yang saya tahu, istrinya sakit.

text: As far as I know, he is unemployed.
translate: Sejauh yang saya tahu, dia menganggur.

text: I overslept; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: Saya ketiduran, kalau tidak saya pasti tepat waktu.

text: He’s going to stay either with us or in the hotel.
translate: Dia tinggal bersama kami atau di hotel.

text: She speaks Spanish as well as English.
translate: Dia berbicara bahasa Spanyol dan juga bahasa Inggris.

text: She has lived in Madrid as well as in London.
translate: Dia pernah tinggal di Madrid juga di London.

text: She knows Spain as well as England.
He is not only stupid, but also lazy.
translate: Dia bukan hanya bodoh, tapi juga malas.

text: She is not only pretty, but also intelligent.
translate: Dia tidak hanya cantik, tapi juga pintar.

text: She speaks not only German, but also French.
translate: Dia tidak hanya berbicara bahasa Jerman, tapi juga bahasa Perancis.

text: I can neither play the piano nor the guitar.
translate: Saya tidak dapat bermain piano maupun gitar.

text: I can neither waltz nor do the samba.
translate: Saya tidak dapat berdansa waltz maupun samba.

text: I like neither opera nor ballet.
translate: Saya tidak menyukai opera maupun balet.

text: The faster you work, the earlier you will be finished.
translate: Semakin cepat kamu bekerja, semakin awal kamu selesai.

text: The earlier you come, the earlier you can go.
translate: Semakin cepat kamu datang, semakin awal kamu pulang.

text: I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: Saya ketinggalan bus, kalau tidak saya pasti tepat waktu.

text: I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: Saya tersesat, kalau tidak pasti saya akan tepat waktu.

text: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
translate: Semakin tua manusia, semakin akan nyaman dirinya.
